sentences.sContent: I felt an uncontrollable urge to scream.
sentences.sCn: 我感到一种控制不住想要尖叫的冲动。
母亲突然情不自禁地抽噎起来。

synos.tran: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的

trans.tranCn: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的
trans.tranOther: if an emotion, desire, or physical action is uncontrollable, you cannot control it or stop yourself from feeling it or doing it
